contexts.context: ...on the capital’s streets these days. Multiple beggars <mark>roam</mark> the streets, the police had to be called...
...put into separate wagons like criminals, as they <mark>roamed</mark> around in every bigger city and aroused pity on...
...and don’t have to wander around abroad and be <mark>roaming</mark> around. Already, there is no luck left...
